scripts.build:docker-test: docker build --rm -t ${npm_package_name}-test:${npm_package_version} --build-arg VERSION=${npm_package_version} --build-arg APP_NAME=${npm_package_name} --build-arg TEAM=${npm_package_author_name} -f Dockerfile.test .
scripts.debug:docker: NODE_ENV=integration APP_NAME=${npm_package_name} VERSION=${npm_package_version} TEAM=${npm_package_author_name} source export_secrets.sh && docker run --rm ${process_envs[@]} -it ${npm_package_name}-test:${npm_package_version} /bin/bash
scripts.debug:docker-root: NODE_ENV=integration APP_NAME=${npm_package_name} VERSION=${npm_package_version} TEAM=${npm_package_author_name} source export_secrets.sh && docker run --rm ${process_envs[@]} --user root -it ${npm_package_name}-test:${npm_package_version} /bin/bash
scripts.start:docker-test: export VAULT_TOKEN=$(cat ~/.vault-token | xargs) && export NODE_ENV=integration && docker run --rm -e NODE_ENV -e VAULT_TOKEN ${npm_package_name}-test:${npm_package_version} node app.js
scripts.test:docker: NODE_ENV=integration APP_NAME=${npm_package_name} VERSION=${npm_package_version} TEAM=${npm_package_author_name} source export_secrets.sh && docker run --rm ${process_envs[@]} ${npm_package_name}-test:${npm_package_version} npm run test-docker
scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf coverage && npm i
